item.title: [HIVE-13310] Vectorized Projection Comparison Number Column to Scalar broken for !noNulls and selectedInUse
item.description:

LongColGreaterEqualLongScalar.java

item.summary: Vectorized Projection Comparison Number Column to Scalar broken for !noNulls and selectedInUse

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: gopalv Can you give this patch a quick +1?
Is this related to HIVE-13220?

Yes, looks related.

The template files ColumnCompareScalar.txt and ScalarCompareColumn.txt look ok for non-Decimal.

But I'm not sure where the Decimal comparsions are generated... but it look broken.
Not sure why the Long compare code isn't generated.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12794158/HIVE-13310.01.patch
